name: Monster Clippers Cerberus Clipper - Vector Engine
shortDescription: Professional clipper with intuitive vector motor technology and responsive torque control
description: The Cerberus Clipper features revolutionary Vector Engine technology - the latest innovation in professional hair clippers. The intuitive torque control technology automatically increases power when resistance is detected, ensuring smooth cutting through thick hair without snags or pulls. Its compact 15cm design fits comfortably in your palm for precise control and effortless handling.
features: Extremely powerful high torque VECTOR motor
Double DLC (Diamond-like carbon coated) Hybrid cutting blade
Metal custom click or freestyle lever
Metal bottom housing for reduced vibration and noise
Multiple spare colored thumb parts and levers included
10 premium double magnetic cutting guides included

specifications.motor: Vector motor with responsive torque control
specifications.blade: Double DLC Hybrid, adjustable zero gap

accessories: Multiple spare thumb parts in different colours
Multiple spare levers in different colours
10 x Premium double magnetic cutting guides (#0.5-1.5mm, #1-3mm, #1.5-4.5mm, #2-6mm, #3-10mm, #4-13mm, #5-16mm, #6-19mm, #7-22mm, #8-25mm)

name: Monster Clippers Cerberus Trimmer - Vector Engine
shortDescription: Professional trimmer with vector motor technology and extra wide T-shaped blade
description: The Cerberus Trimmer brings Vector Motor technology to precision trimming work. With intuitive torque control that adapts to hair resistance, this trimmer delivers smooth, efficient cutting without snags. The extra wide T-shaped double DLC blade combined with 10,000 RPM power makes it perfect for detailed work, outlining, and finishing. Its compact 15cm design allows you to work closer to hair and skin with exceptional ease.
features: Extremely powerful high torque VECTOR motor
Extra wide T-shaped double DLC cutting blades
Metal bottom housing for reduced vibration and noise
Multiple spare colored top parts included

specifications.motor: Vector motor with responsive torque control
specifications.blade: Extra wide T-shaped double DLC, adjustable zero gap

accessories: Multiple spare top parts in different colours

name: Monster Clippers Assassin Shaver
shortDescription: Professional pocket-sized shaver with hypo-allergenic gold titanium foil
description: The Assassin is a professional lightweight pocket-sized shaver with a powerful turbocharged motor running at 9,000 RPM. Its compact design makes it perfect for travel while maintaining professional-grade performance. The hypo-allergenic gold titanium foil delivers a bump-free shaving experience, ideal for sensitive skin. Fast charging lithium-ion battery provides 90 minutes of runtime with USB-C convenience.
features: Hypo-allergenic gold titanium foil for bump-free shaving
accessories: Interchangeable plugs: EU, UK and UL/US
